name: Chaos Field
description: Chaos Field (カオスフィールド, Kaosu Fīrudo) is a 2004 shoot 'em up video game developed by MileStone for the Sega NAOMI arcade platform. It was ported to Dreamcast, PlayStation 2, and Nintendo GameCube; the PlayStation 2 version is known as Chaos Field New Order, and the GameCube version is known as Chaos Field Expanded. The GameCube version was also the only standalone version to be released outside Japan, in North America, where it was simply titled Chaos Field. The game is also included in the Ultimate Shooting Collection for the Wii.
